import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container'; import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row'; import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col'; import '../css/editRequest.css'; import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { EmployeeState, RequestState } from '../redux/reducer'; import { useHistory } from 'react-router-dom'; function EditRequest() { // use redux hooks const employee = useSelector((state: EmployeeState) => state.employee); const request = useSelector((state: RequestState) => state.request); const history = useHistory(); // check if employee and request's maker are the same let match = employee.demographics.email == request.demographics.email ? true : false; // check status of request let status = request.statusOf; //handle cancel button function handleCancelButtonClick() { history.push("/dashboard"); } return (

Tuition Reimbursement Form
Today's Date First Name Last Name Phone Number Email Event Type Cost Projected Reimbursement Start Date End Date Grading Format Location Event Description Justification {status === 'Pending' && !match ? : null }
); } export default EditRequest;
